name: Meditite

evolution.description: Meditite can evolve into Medicham at level 10 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 13 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Meditate Pokémon. Meditite heightens its inner energy through meditation. It survives on just one berry a day. Minimal eating is another aspect of this Pokémon's training.

abilities.name: Pure Power
abilities.description: Once per short rest, this Pokémon may double the damage dice for a single damage roll. The player must announce that they are using this ability before the attack roll.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be damaged by its allies' attacks.
